players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "I find it strange that Charlie was the one found dead last night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and work together to uncover any hidden information."
You: "I agree with Bob's suggestion to keep a close eye on each other. It is crucial that we work together to uncover any hidden information and ensure the safety of our town."

Bob: "I believe it's important that we all share any information we may have, no matter how insignificant it seems. By working together and communicating openly, we can increase the chances of identifying the culprit and ensuring the safety of our town."

You: "I urge everyone to be honest and transparent during our discussions. The truth will help us identify the culprit and ensure the safety of our town. Let's work together and trust each other in this investigation."
Diana: "I will remain silent and observe everyone's actions. If I see any suspicious behavior, I will take appropriate action."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
